definition: full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

pinyin: Ha1 bo2 Tai4 kong1 Wang4 yuan3 jing4

sentences.chinese: 他再次舉起自己的望遠鏡。

sentences.english: Nature composes some of her loveliest poems for the microscope and telescope.
sentences.chinese: 自然爲顯微鏡和望遠鏡創作了一些她最優美的詩。

sentences.english: By using a binocular, i saw her butt cleavage.
sentences.chinese: 用望遠鏡，我看見她的股溝了。
這臺望遠鏡擁有三臺高靈敏度的紅外照相機。

sentences.english: A robot-arm from the Endeavour will grab the telescope.
sentences.chinese: “奮進”號上的一隻機器手將抓住望遠鏡並托住它。

sentences.english: There’s a difference between a telescope builder and an astronomer, of course.
sentences.chinese: 當然，望遠鏡的製造者和天文學家是有所不同的。

sentences.english: The curved glass lenses at each end of the telescope acted like prisms.
sentences.chinese: 望遠鏡兩端的曲面玻璃鏡頭起到了三棱鏡的作用。

sentences.english: The captain was rectifying his telescope.
sentences.chinese: 船長正在調他的望遠鏡。

sentences.english: He looked through his telescope at the approaching ship.
sentences.chinese: 他透過望遠鏡看着駛近的輪船。

sentences.english: Some astronomoers worked on purly theoretical problems and never use the telescope at all.
sentences.chinese: 一些研究理論問題的天文學家，根本不使用望遠鏡。

sentences.english: The soul without imagination is what an observatory would be without a telescope.
sentences.chinese: 人沒有想象力，猶如無文臺沒有望遠鏡。

sentences.english: The trouble is that Earth - bound telescopes must look through the Earth's atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 但問題在於，地面望遠鏡的觀測必須穿越大氣層。

sentences.english: ”She reached to the bookcase and pulled out a pair of binoculars.
sentences.chinese: 她於是走到書櫃前，取出了一副望遠鏡。

sentences.english: She always watches the passers-by with a pair of binoculars.
sentences.chinese: 她總是用望遠鏡觀察過路人。

sentences.english: I was crazy about the stars, and pestered my father into buying me a telescope.
sentences.chinese: 我對星星着了迷，吵着要我爸爸買一架望遠鏡。

sentences.english: Basic guidance on how to choose the best bird-watching binoculars.
sentences.chinese: 基本指導如何選擇最好的觀鳥望遠鏡。

definition: imitation/to simulate/to imitate/analog (device, as opposed to digital)
